sentences.en: Although she had only met the old man once, he had made an indelible impression on her.
sentences.cn: 虽然她和那老人只见过一面, 可却在她心上留下了不可磨灭的深刻印象.
你们是否使用不褪色的涂料?

sentences.en: Her words left an indelible impression on me for years to come.
sentences.cn: 她的话多年来我都难以忘怀。

sentences.en: His concern for the masses made an indelible impression on us.
sentences.cn: 他对群众的关怀给我们留下不可磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: In making aluminum silver starch process, the helping exerts indelible function.
sentences.cn: 铝银浆制备过程中, 助剂发挥着不可磨灭的作用.

sentences.en: It leaves indelible stains on clothes.
sentences.cn: 它会在衣物上留下洗不掉的污渍。

sentences.en: It's as if they are written in indelible ink.
sentences.cn: 那是用永不退色的墨水写成的.

sentences.en: The book left an indelible impression on me.
sentences.cn: 那本书给我留下了不可磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: The experience made an indelible impression on me.
sentences.cn: 那次经历使我难以忘怀。

sentences.en: The handsome young fellow, with indelible Whipple charm stamped on his bright features.
sentences.cn: 身材颀长,举止潇洒, 惠普尔家的血统在他身上犹为突出.

sentences.en: The image was absolutely terrible and left an indelible imprint on me.
sentences.cn: 这种形象非常可怕,给我留下了不可磨灭的印象.

sentences.en: The message was written in indelible ink.
sentences.cn: 这条信息是用不褪色的墨水写的。

sentences.en: The sinister atmosphere of the place left an indelible imprint on my memory.
sentences.cn: 此处不祥的氛围在我的记忆中刻下了不可磨灭的印记.

sentences.en: The war has made an indelible mark on the world.
sentences.cn: 战争给世人留下了不可磨灭的印记。

sentences.en: The whole incident left one indelible impression.
sentences.cn: 整个事件给人留下深刻的印象.

sentences.en: These horrible events have darkened the pages of European history with an indelible strain.
sentences.cn: 这些可怕的事件在欧洲的史册上留下了黑暗的记载,给它抹上了无法洗刷的污点.

sentences.en: Yes, we'll use water - proof, indelible paint.
sentences.cn: 我们将使用防水 、 不褪色的涂料.

trans.tran_cn: 擦不掉的，永久的，持久的，不可磨灭
trans.tran_en: Indelible ink or an indelible stain cannot be removed or washed out
